import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Menu.css'; function Menu() { const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('pizzas'); const [orderForm, setOrderForm] = useState({ item: '', quantity: 1, special: '' }); const handleCategoryChange = (category) => { setActiveCategory(category); }; const handleOrderChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setOrderForm(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleOrderSubmit = (e, item) => { e.preventDefault(); // Traitement de la commande console.log('Commande:', { ...orderForm, item }); alert(`Vous avez commandé ${orderForm.quantity} ${item}!`); setOrderForm({ item: '', quantity: 1, special: '' }); }; return (
